Summary: Bright light shooting across the sky, stops and disappears.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsAs i was driving up around an ally around my house, i noticed a bright object moving fast a crossed the sky right above the tree line. I parked my car and noticed that it had disappeared. I walked around my house and noticed that the light was back, it moved right and then left, blinked a few times then it disappear. There is a lot of helicopters that fly past my house for the hospital, but it did not make any sound and it was just a white light so I can't say that it was a helicopter. I also added a picture of the skyline where I saw it at.
